definition: to exhale slowly/to hiss/hush!
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

(onom.) to sigh/to sob

variant of 喘吁吁[chuan3 xu1 xu1]
to hiss (as a sign of displeasure)

sentences.chinese: 奧利安娜，噓，她就在那兒。

sentences.english: He hissed me and pointed to the door where a man came out.
sentences.chinese: 他向我噓了一聲，並指了指有人走出來的那個門。

sentences.english: What flies, whistles, and doesn't get up the ass?
sentences.chinese: 什麼東西會飛，會噓噓作響，而且不會鑽到屁股裏去？

sentences.english: Listen up, people, do not shush away silence, do not replace it with anything anymore.
sentences.chinese: 聽着，不要噓走寂靜，不要用任何東西替代它。

sentences.english: He got booed after his first audition but he did not give up.
sentences.chinese: 他被噓了，儘管他以前從沒被噓過。

sentences.english: When he missed, Shane's father booed .
sentences.chinese: 夏恩一漏接，他父親就大聲噓他。

sentences.english: It is also against the law for a man to relieve himself while standing up after 10pm.
sentences.chinese: 晚上10點以後男士們站着噓噓也同樣是違法的哦。

sentences.english: It is also against the law for a man to relieve himself while standing up after 10pm.
sentences.chinese: 晚上10點以後男士們站着噓噓也同樣是違法的哦。

sentences.english: Her voice thinned down to a whisper as people turned to shush her.
sentences.chinese: 當人們回過頭來噓她時，她就放低嗓門講話了。

sentences.english: Don't scald your hands when you open the steamer.
sentences.chinese: 掀籠屜時小心熱氣噓着手。

sentences.english: They hissed him off [from] the stage.
And some criticized Chinese fans for booing Safina.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些人批評中國觀衆對薩芬娜的“噓”聲。

sentences.english: Sh-h-h. High-school students are taking the college-entrance exams.
sentences.chinese: 噓，高中生們在進行高考。
他們向演講人發出“噓”叫聲。

sentences.english: Oh, and don't ask where I'm getting the money.
sentences.chinese: 噓，別問我從哪兒弄那麼多錢哦。
